meta.title: An Overview of the Secret Cycle

nodes.body:
The Secret Cycle, while doxographically subordinated by Seminal Heart adherents to their own Unsurpassed Secret Cycle, appears in fact to be a competing and contemporary eleventh century-based movement spearheaded above all by Lce sgom nag po (eleventh-twelfth century).

Some of the texts included in this cycle present their own versions of the four intermediate processes.  The Totally Radiant Seminal Nucleus (thig le kun gsal) substitutes meditation for dying in its presentation:  (i) natural intermediate process, (ii) intermediate process of contemplation, (iii) intermediate process of dreaming, and (iv) intermediate process of reality.  The Victorious Intention of the Quintessential Esoteric Precepts (man ngag snying gi dgongs pa rgyal ba) has its own fourfold presentation of (i) natural intermediate process, (ii) intermediate process of contemplation, (iii) intermediate process of dreaming, and (iv) intermediate process of reality.
